name: Surveys App
what: A web application for creating and managing surveys.
why: This project was created to provide businesses with a simple and intuitive tool for gathering customer feedback.
how: The frontend was built with React and the backend was built with Node.js and MongoDB.

name: Wellhall Hotel Website
what: A website for the fictional Wellhall Hotel.
why: This project was created as a mean to showcase my skills as a web developer and to practice designing and building websites as a whole.
how: The website was built with React and Typescript. Deployed in Github Pages.

name: Lucky Bakery
what: A static website for Lucky Bakery
why: Lucky Bakery is a small business that needed an online presence to showcase their products to potential customers.
how: The website was designed in Figma, built with Typescript and Next JS

name: Fitness Tracker
what: A mobile application for tracking fitness activities.
why: This project was created to help individuals track and improve their fitness levels.
how: The app was built with React Native and Firebase.

name: Recipe Sharing App
what: A mobile application for finding and sharing recipes.
why: This project was created to make it easier for people to discover new recipes and share their own.
how: The app was built with Flutter and the backend was built with Node.js and MongoDB.

name: E-commerce Store
what: An e-commerce website for selling products online.
why: This project was created to provide a platform for small businesses to sell their products online.
how: The frontend was built with Next.js and the backend was built with Express.js and PostgreSQL.
